backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining roles, publication status controls, and types for lessons, assignments, progress, and report cards with admin-gated publish/unpublish logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables and dark mode overrides along with global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, Apple touch settings, manifest link, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest declaring app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing static and dynamic caching, network-first handling for backend calls, offline fallback, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring up routing, authentication, publication gating, profile setup flow, and rendering dashboard or landing content based on state.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublication: Admin UI for publishing or unpublishing the app, including reason input and status display.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentsTab.t: Displays student assignments and provides teachers tools to assign lessons and manage submissions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth controls, branding, and an offline indicator.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA install prompts for web and iOS, showing a dismissible install card.
frontend/src/components/LessonPlansTab.t: Lists and filters lesson plans and allows teachers to create custom or AI-assisted lessons.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows alerts when the app goes offline or comes back online using PWA connectivity status.
Interactive onboarding modal guiding teachers or students through features, with step navigation and localStorage tracking of completion.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBanner.ts: Displays a premium upsell alert if the user lacks premium access, offering an upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing users to set name and role, with role pre-filled based on sign‑in type.
frontend/src/components/ProgressTab.tsx: Shows assignment completion stats, averages, and subject data for a student, pulling progress via queries.
frontend/src/components/ReportCardsTab.t: Manages premium report card generation, subscription status, checkout flow, and displays existing report cards.
frontend/src/components/RoleSignInButton: Provides role‑specific sign‑in buttons or dropdown, storing chosen role before triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Modal form that lets admins enter a Stripe secret key and allowed countries, then saves the configuration via a mutation.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines the app name, short name, and tagline for branding.
frontend/src/constants/premiumPricing.ts: Centralizes premium report card pricing constants and provides a helper to build checkout items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, login/logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWA.ts: Tracks PWA installation status, network status, and service worker update availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, subjects, admin actions, and Stripe config.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for theming and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AppStorePreview.tsx: Empty placeholder page for App Store preview.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing user greeting, onboarding, premium banner, and tabbed views for lessons, assignments, progress, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and sign‑in or dashboard redirect based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Displays a cancellation message after a failed or cancelled payment and provides a button back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a success message after payment, refreshes premium access queries, and links back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Takedown.tsx: Maintenance/takedown notice page with optional reason details and admin publication controls.
frontend/src/utils/lessonUpload.ts: Utility functions for validating text file uploads, deriving titles, reading files, and generating unsupported file errors.
frontend/src/utils/signInType.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing pre‑login sign‑in type in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, themes, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state for an app with role-specific sign‑in, first‑time profile setup logic, and a backend-controlled published/unpublished mode. Includes architectural notes, existing feature definitions, and versioning metadata.
